attributes.action: UK Led Investigation into the deaths of british citizens during the events of 9/11 (US)
attributes.additional_details:
During the past 10 years substantial evidence has come to light regarding the events of 11/09/01 in the United States of America. This evidence contradicts and official 9/11 report and subsequent NIST reports.

This evidence was gathered via numerous sources - collated and scrutinized by independent scholars, engineering specialists, first responders (9/11 US), architects and investigative reporters (including the BBC) and scientific professionals.

The UK government should lead a proper and open investigation into the deaths of UK citizens during these events.

1) Chemical signature of the incendiary thermite found in solidified molten metal, and dust samples. Independently verified.

2) Evidence of thermite incendiaries found by FEMA in steel samples. Verified by 5 independent laboratories.

3) 1200-foot-diameter debris field: no "pancaked" floors found - As per official report.
